description: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React.js, ensuring high performance across devices.
Integrated RESTful APIs into frontend components to fetch real-time data, enhancing user engagement and reducing static content usage by 40%.
Improved front-end performance by utilizing React.js best practices, including component reusability, state management, and lazy loading, leading to faster load times and improved interactivity.
Tech Stack: React.js, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, APIs
